attributes.action: Fund research into the concept of Liquid Fluoride Thorium Reactors
attributes.additional_details:
In a world of ever-shrinking natural resources and with humanity's unsustainable impact on the environment, energy alternatives are urgently sought- yet perhaps not with the urgency required. This petition asks the government to seriously research the possibility of Liquid Flouride Thorium Reactors for the future of our country's energy needs. Whilst they are undoubtedly are an attractive yet unfinished concept, the technological barriers are seemingly not insurmountable.

A brief explanation on LFTRs can be found here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uK367T7h6ZY
